definition: to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries

sentences.english: Blog membership must be managed from the group itself.
sentences.chinese: 博客成员关系必须由群组本身管理。

sentences.english: Do you really want to delete this initiator group?
sentences.chinese: 您确定要删除这个创始者群组吗？

sentences.english: Gets and sets the number of items in the subtree under this group.
sentences.chinese: 取得及设定这个群组底下树状子目录中的项目数。

sentences.english: Contacto - Smart Contact Management, Group Email, Photo Speed Dialer.
sentences.chinese: 智能联系管理，群组电子邮件，照片快拨。

sentences.english: A project-level group provides permissions only for that project.
sentences.chinese: 专案层级群组只会提供该专案的使用权限。

sentences.english: You can also add bookmarks and feeds to the group.
sentences.chinese: 还可以向这个群组添加书签和提要。

sentences.english: By default, the graph shows cross-group links only for nodes that are selected.
sentences.chinese: 图形预设只会在选取的节点间显示跨群组连结。

sentences.english: Personas represent market segments or user groups.
sentences.chinese: 人员可代表市场区隔或使用者群组。

sentences.english: You can comment on files, folders, users and groups.
sentences.chinese: 你能够评论文件，文件夹，用户和群组。

sentences.english: All of the contact groups are listed in the Group List.
sentences.chinese: 所有的群组都陈列于群组列表中。

sentences.english: All of the contact groups are listed in the Group List.
sentences.chinese: 所有的群组都陈列于群组列表中。

sentences.english: Describes how to assign a new name to a custom collection-level group.
sentences.chinese: 说明如何指派新名称给自订的集合层级群组。

sentences.english: Describes server-level groups and how to create and maintain them.
sentences.chinese: 描述伺服器层级群组以及建立和维护它们的方式。

sentences.english: Describes collection-level groups and how to create and maintain them.
sentences.chinese: 描述集合层级群组以及建立和维护它们的方式。

sentences.english: Provides steps for creating subsets of summary information by organizing data into groups.
sentences.chinese: 借由将资料组成群组以建立摘要资讯子集合的步骤。

sentences.english: You cannot remove the default groups at the collection-level, only custom groups.
sentences.chinese: 您无法在集合层级移除预设群组，只能移除自订群组。

definition: to send to multiple recipients/mass mailout/to occur in a clustered fashion
